mapper.select: SELECT s_code , c_code , u_id , To_char(s_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_start , To_char(s_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_end , To_char(s_arrive, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_arrive , To_char(s_leave, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_leave , sr_code , s_stat FROM schedule WHERE s_start >= To_date(#{s_start}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND s_start < To_date( #{s_start},'YYYYMMDD') + (interval '7' day) AND c_code = #{c_code} AND u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY s_start

SELECT s_code , c_code , u_id , To_char(s_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_start , To_char(s_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_end , To_char(s_arrive, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_arrive , To_char(s_leave, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') s_leave , sr_code , s_stat FROM schedule WHERE To_char(s_start, 'YYYYMM') = #{s_start} AND c_code = #{c_code} AND u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY s_start

SELECT Count(s_code) FROM (SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND c_code = #{c_code} AND s_stat != 'R' AND Trunc(s_start) = Trunc(To_date( #{s_start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'))) tbl WHERE ( tbl.s_start <= To_date( #{s_start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AND tbl.s_end > To_date( #{s_start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') ) OR ( tbl.s_start < To_date( #{s_end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AND tbl.s_end > To_date( #{s_end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') ) OR ( tbl.s_start > To_date( #{s_start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AND tbl.s_end < To_date( #{s_end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') ) OR ( Trunc(tbl.s_start) = Trunc(To_date( #{s_start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) ) OR ( Trunc(tbl.s_end) = Trunc(To_date( #{s_end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) )
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE c_code = #{c_code} AND s_stat = 'W'
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE c_code = #{c_code} AND s_stat = 'D'
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE To_char(s_start, 'YYYYMMDD') = To_char(SYSDATE - ( interval '2' day ), 'YYYYMMDD') AND s_stat = 'P'
